title: Metro Last Light
description:
Metro Last Light

 It Is the Year 2034

 Beneath the ruins of post-apocalyptic Moscow, in the tunnels of the Metro
 the remnants of mankind are besieged by deadly threats from outside and
 within. Mutants stalk the catacombs beneath the desolate surface, and hunt
 amidst the poisoned skies above

 But rather than stand united, the station-cities of the Metro are locked in a
 struggle for the ultimate power, a doomsday device from the military vaults
 of D6. A civil war is stirring that could wipe humanity from the face of the
 earth forever

 As Artyom, burdened by guilt but driven by hope, you hold the key to our
 survival the last light in our darkest hour

  Install notes:

  1. Burn or mount the image.
  2. Install the game. 
  3. Copy over the cracked content to your game install directory.
  4. Play the game.
  5. Seed and Enjoy!
